value.title: Quickly create reports in the Power BI service (preview)
value.excerpt: We’re excited to introduce a new way to quickly create reports in the Power BI service. Rather than downloading Power BI Desktop and importing the data, you’ll now be able to paste data straight into Power BI on the web and have visuals automatically generated for you.

value.title: Announcing Datasets Hub (Preview) to explore and analyze your business data
value.excerpt:
We’re excited to introduce a new datasets hub in the Power BI service and Power BI personal app in Teams.
The datasets hub makes it easy to find, explore, and use the datasets in your organization. It provides information about the datasets as well as entry points for creating reports on top of those

value.title: Here's all that is new in Power BI's last update for 2020
value.excerpt: Power BI has received a host of new updates this month. The final update for this year is now rolling out, with some new capabilities being featured, as well as some recent ones being highlighted.

value.title: Anomaly detection (preview) is now supported in Power BI Mobile apps
value.excerpt: With the the latest Power BI Mobile apps release report consumers can view and understand anomalies directly from the mobile apps! This capability is available on all apps (iOS, Android, Windows), in all supported form factors (phone, tablet, iPad, and laptop/desktop, including Surface Hub).
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/JC8xM74Bhlo" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: MariaDB Direct Query Adapter Now Available and Certified in Microsoft Power BI
value.excerpt: Before it's here, it's on the Bloomberg Terminal.

value.title: Power BI Premium per user license offers enhanced deployment pipelines creation
value.excerpt: Earlier this week, Microsoft introduced Information Protection sensitivity labels for Power BI Desktop, while a few days before that the data visualization service received new Admin APIs and Service Principal authentication. Going back a bit further ...

value.title: Power BI December 2020 Feature Summary
value.excerpt:
The last update of 2020 is here! We know you are excited for this update, like a kid excited to open their presents. This update is our holiday present to you!
So what is in the box? Read on to find out!

value.title: Announcing Dataflows Power Automate Connector public preview
value.excerpt: we’re excited to announce the Preview availability of the Power Automate Dataflow connector along with templates and sample scenarios you can get started with right away. The new connector provides a new way to react to dataflow events to take action on dataflows. Combined with other Power Platform Products
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/68YvRs49VZM" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: DirectQuery for Power BI datasets and Azure Analysis Services (preview)
value.excerpt:
In Nov 2018, we released composite models, which allow you to seamlessly add multiple DirectQuery sources and imported data to your models. We have heard your feedback that you would like to do this with sources you previously live connected to, like Power BI datasets and Azure Analysis Services sources.

We

value.title: Announcing Small Multiples (preview)
value.excerpt: This month, we’re releasing a preview version of the small multiples feature! In this blog post, we’ll be going over how to create and interact with small multiples now, its current limitations, and what our plans are for the feature moving forward. At the end, we will also include ways for

value.title: Enhance deployment pipelines creation with Premium per user license
value.excerpt:
The new ‘Premium per user’ license enables more BI creators to start working with deployment pipelines, and it’s never been easier!
Read more to learn how can you use the new license with deployment pipelines.

value.title: Power BI Desktop gets Microsoft Information Protection sensitivity labels
value.excerpt: The new capability is now being introduced to Desktop, after coming to Power BI last year. This introduction continues with the addition of recent data protection capabilities brought to Power BI.

value.title: Announcing Microsoft Information Protection Sensitivity Labels in Power BI Desktop (Public Preview)
value.excerpt: We are excited to extend Power BI’s sensitivity label capabilities by bringing Microsoft Information Protection sensitivity labels into Power BI Desktop, allowing creators to apply sensitivity labels just as they start building their datasets and reports in Power BI Desktop.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/9Eu1gNYCLX0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Power BI gets new Admin APIs and Service Principal authentication
value.excerpt: The new Admin APIs for Microsoft's data visualization platform will aim to improve the efficiency and performance of the Power BI scan, in order to help support a higher frequency of data assets.

value.title: Power BI On-premises data gateway update brings Azure Cosmos DB Connector and more
value.excerpt: The December update for the On-premises data gateway brings a few new things to report on, aside from the usual new version of the mashup engine that is often the highlight of these updates.

value.title: On-premises data gateway December 2020 update is now available
value.excerpt: December 2020 release of gateway

value.title: Large model support in Power BI Premium reaches GA, new features announced
value.excerpt: With large model support making it to general availability a year on, new capabilities including user interface enhancements, multi-geo support, and more have been unveiled for the release as well.

value.title: Power BI Premium gets full report attachments for report subscriptions
value.excerpt: Full reports can now be included as PowerPoint or PDF attachments in Power BI Premium workspaces. The public preview of the Premium per user capability has also been fully rolled out.

value.title: Announcing large model support in Power BI Premium General Availability (GA)
value.excerpt: We are excited to announce General Availability (GA) for Power BI Premium support for large models, along with additional new features, such as User interface enhancements, Multi-Geo support, and Bring your own encryption keys (BYOK).

value.title: Full report attachment for subscriptions for Power BI Premium reports now available
value.excerpt: We’re starting off the first full week of December with a bang!  First, we finished rolling out the public preview of Premium per user to all public tenants earlier today.  And now, as if you needed another reason to jump into the preview, we’re pleased to announce one of the most highly

value.title: Announcing Power BI Admins can upgrade classic workspaces and roadmap update
value.excerpt:
Today’s announcements give a roadmap update for workspace upgrade, content pack deprecation, and announce new tools for Power BI Admins to upgrading classic workspaces through the admin portal. 

Announcements:

Workspace upgrade has reached general availability.
We’ve started to roll-out

value.title: Building systems of insights at enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure
value.excerpt: Today, Microsoft announced the general availability of Azure Synapse Analytics and the preview of Azure Purview, a unified data governance service. Azure Synapse Analytics is a limitless analytics service that brings together data integration, enterprise data warehousing, and big data analytics.

value.title: Use Power BI with Azure Purview to achieve better data governance and discovery
value.excerpt: Power BI has partnered with the newly released Azure Purview to provide enhanced governance and cataloging capabilities for our customers. The Azure Purview/Power BI integration makes it possible for you to discover and govern all your hybrid data, and thereby gain a more complete understanding of your

value.title: Power BI adds automated template app installation configuration capability
value.excerpt: Template app publishers will now be able to automate installation configurations for their customers. The new capability completely eliminates parameter configuration from the user end.

value.title: Automate configuration of a template app installation
value.excerpt: Announcing a new capability that enables template app publishers to automate the configuration of a template app installation for their customers!
